text:
‘Spider-Man Doesn’t Want His Life Back After This’, SOTY 2 Trailer Evokes Hilarious Outrage!
‘Spider-Man Doesn’t Want His Life Back After This’, SOTY 2 Trailer Evokes Hilarious Outrage!
Dharma productions dropped the trailer of 'Student Of The Year 2' and first reactions prove that it hasn't been able to live upto all the hype and hoopla it created. Starring Tiger Shroff and debutants Ananya Panday and Tara Sutaria, the film is a love triangle revolving around a school competition.
In just a few hours of the release, people have a lot to say about the trailer. From making fun of a particular scene where Tiger and Tara dressed up as superheroes Spider-Man and Wonder Woman, to creating memes from some of the most absurd dialogues, there are some hilarious memes that sum up the first reactions to the movie.
One of the tweets read: “I feel u both @MarvelStudios and @TheDCUniverse can file defamation case against @DharmaMovies for this...can claim Rs. 1000-2000 crore...”
In case you are wondering what's in store for you, have a look at the memes right here and most hilarious tweets!
When Marvel and DC characters met at Baba Siddique's Iftar party pic.twitter.com/zdsKMirhCl — Sagar (@sagarcasm) April 12, 2019
Don't Miss 357 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES 207 SHARES 542 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES
Topper friend: Bhai tu saal bhar to Padtha nhi h fr bhi pass kaise ho jata h
Me:#SOTY2Trailer pic.twitter.com/CJnuJUriO4 — Saurabh Manjhi 🇮🇳 (@saurabhmanjhi_) April 12, 2019
When Tiger Shroff had Mooli Ke Parathe for breakfast. #SOTY2Trailer pic.twitter.com/6MbjobLpQe — Bhosdi Waley (@bhosdiwaley) April 12, 2019
#SOTY2Trailer
Delivery guy: bhaiya me order lekar gate per khada hu
Me : pic.twitter.com/TdDmXNYoVl — Chowkidar Humor Being (@followTheGupta) April 12, 2019
